name: MEC Toasty Mitts - Children to Youths
categories: Toddler and child gloves and mittens
description:
Easy-to-put-on shelled fleece mitts, with warm synthetic insulation. These have all the features kids need for winter play. They shed water and snowmelt, have a generous, high-loft insulation, and they have durable textured palms that help grip icy and snowy things.Shell is made of double-layer polyester with a polyurethane laminate and water repellant finish.Shells are not taped at seams, but the material and DWR provide excellent protection from wind, rain and snow.Soft fleece lining and 300g insulation on backs, 60g through the palms.Durable coated nylon palms.Long elastic cuffs stay put under jacket sleeves and help trap heat in.Hook-and-loop strap secures them in place.Reflective piping adds here-I-am visibility.

        Sustainability
